title: Please stop reporting everyone when you lose
body:
If losing is a bannable offense, then 95% of the community would be banned.

Show me where in the Summoner Code it says "Do not lose."

replies.body: It is ok to report someone if someone is trolling/ intentionally feeding but you can't report someone for having a bad game.

> [{quoted}](name=Nudes4Skins,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:01:57.274+0000)
>
> It is ok to report someone if someone is trolling/ intentionally feeding but you can't report someone for having a bad game.

unfortunately, Riot made the "Unskilled Player" an option in there...so people just use that when they are pissed off and have nothing else to report the person on.  :/

> [{quoted}](name=shortjeanshorts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:04:29.773+0000)
>
> unfortunately, Riot made the "Unskilled Player" an option in there...so people just use that when they are pissed off and have nothing else to report the person on.  :/

That's fine.. it is only for match making tuning. There are no penalties for being reported as unskilled.

I am guessing that getting reported for losing is a) rarer than needed for this thread and b) has less repercussions than needed for this thread.

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:08:07.736+0000)
>
> That's fine.. it is only for match making tuning. There are no penalties for being reported as unskilled.
> 
> I am guessing that getting reported for losing is a) rarer than needed for this thread and b) has less repercussions than needed for this thread.

Honestly, kids just need to learn to chill out.  lol.  In the end of the day, everything is going to be ok.  You may have lost 2, 3, 5, 10 games in a row, but its just a game.  If you play 10 games of Chess with a buddy and lose every time, do you get pissed off and chuck pawns at him, or do you tell him gg and ask to play another.  sooner or later, you WILL win...even if you are less skilled.  We are human, even pro's make mistakes.  If no one made a mistake in any game, Every game would still be going since LoL started...lol.

I was unskilled when I went into Ranked. 30 levels was easy to reach in just short of 2 or 3 months. I went into Ranked and didn't build any AP on Mordekaiser for top lane, lost so badly (mostly because my top lane buddy was a Xerath and that was crazy hard to work around when unskilled) but one of my teammates helped me through it by showing me the Store. I wish instead of being mad at people for doing bad, they realize that no one is perfect. If you win a game, that's because you had one of two things (maybe 3): 1) had better champions (you know some are better than others) 2) your team is more skilled ( 3) someone (on your side or theirs) is AFK). That's what it comes to.

Wait, how did you not know about the store at level 30?  Even the old tutorial showed it to you, as does the new one, and I have some real trouble believing that none of your teammates noticed you didn't have items until ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=shortjeanshorts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:12:54.781+0000)
>
> Honestly, kids just need to learn to chill out.  lol.  In the end of the day, everything is going to be ok.  You may have lost 2, 3, 5, 10 games in a row, but its just a game.  If you play 10 games of Chess with a buddy and lose every time, do you get pissed off and chuck pawns at him, or do you tell him gg and ask to play another.  sooner or later, you WILL win...even if you are less skilled.  We are human, even pro's make mistakes.  If no one made a mistake in any game, Every game would still be going since LoL started...lol.

People lose 10 games in a row they blame their team.  People win 10 games in a row, they think they should be Challenger.  LoL

> [{quoted}](name=shortjeanshorts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:04:29.773+0000)
>
> unfortunately, Riot made the "Unskilled Player" an option in there...so people just use that when they are pissed off and have nothing else to report the person on.  :/

Actually people figured out pretty quickly that "verbal abuse" is the best thing to report people for. Ive been reported for verbal abuse in lost games where I didn't say anything.

> [{quoted}](name=Nudes4Skins,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:01:57.274+0000)
>
> It is ok to report someone if someone is trolling/ intentionally feeding but you can't report someone for having a bad game.

So you can't report those vayne players in ranked? Damn.

It is entirely okay to report people for being unskilled because you can't be banned for that. The issue is kids who report people for feeding when they just got wrecked in lane. Reporting people for unskilled is great if people will do that instead of trying to report players who got beat for feeding.

It is not okay. Unskilled player is a "serious" report in the fact that is used by the system to determine how good you are. It should be a tool to prevent things like MMR boosting (reporting someone who is in Gold but plays worse than your level 15-friend). You should not report someone just because they are 0-6 or things like that. Abusing the "unskilled player" report just to report someone every time they have a bad game just causes the system to ignore all unskilled player reports, because it can diferentiate the good ones from the "I'm salty and you'll play for it" ones.

Except that if you go 0-6 you're clearly over matched. Sometimes this is because your opponent is climbing and is much better than the MMR you are both at, sometimes it is because you had an off game or your focus was elsewhere, sometimes it's because you're on a win streak and it pushed your MMR high enough that you're against players that are better than you. It doesn't really matter why, but the fact of the matter is your skill didn't show or wasn't enough that game and unskilled is a completely legitimate report about your performance that game. If you're more skilled and had an off game it won't matter much, because you'll win games and you'll be put against more difficult players either way. It really doesn't have any effect except that you may lose 1 or 2 LP from your next win (which the loss probably did more to hurt than the report if you're winning consistently and playing well consistently (and thus only being reported a few times and it doesn't effect your MMR much, because the majority of games you lose you still play decently in and aren't reported, and you win more than 50% so your MMR goes up).

idk, i feel like 'unskilled' means you play as though you're a full tier under your elo, or don't understand basic gameplay if you're being reported in bronze.

if you're consistently diving someone, that's intentional feeding. getting outplayed doesn't mean you're not skilled enough to play with those people. but i guess it's open to interpretation, i feel like reporting means they DRASTICALLY underperformed. to me, that's 0/10 or something with a loss of lane and no presence in objective control or teamfights. or if, for example, your jungler wants to swear that his job isn't to assist anyone else in a team-based game.

i don't mean that this jungler didn't gank you because you fell behind and wanted to help the teammates who are relevant get ahead, i mean if the jungler picks {{champion:131}}  and then utterly refuses to gank any lanes.

Or if your top laner picks teleport and uses it to teleport to a nexus turret in the laning phase because he thinks it's more effective than recall.

I guess I do overlook the fact that it is probably subjective and depends on rank to some degree. In normals there is probably much more variance, and 0-6 probably is someone who has no idea of the match up bc they are practicing a new champ. In the ranked games I play, an enemy getting FB from you and a kill roaming to another lane means you lost lane generally, going 0-3 means you lost lane hard and probably got dove by the jg and your lane bc you were too far behind to just play safe. In the games I play 0-6 is legitimately a player who is really struggling, because not only are they dying to a lane who beat them, but they are continually trying to fight them when they don't have enough damage to get the kill. Admittedly I'd rather have someone 0-6 on my team than someone 2-6 or like 3-10 or something, but unless they are 0-6 and went super tanky and die in team fights forcing the other team to focus someone worth no gold, then 0-6 means you had probably the worst game you have in your last 15-20 games if you're not dropping MMR in my experience of ranked.

Or if you are being a douche and play teemo vs nasus in ranked.
Never first pick Nasus bois.
The nasus will go 0/3 or 0/6 and something like that cuz teemo is 2demon4u

Children will never understand someone can have a bad day, i mean if they had a bad day they wouldn't even realise because they'll manage to put the blame somewhere in his team, 99% of the cases on jungler, 1% of the cases, they play jungler ;) .
Braum's mother said so....

If losing is a bannable offense, then EVERYONE in the community would be banned.

We've all lost a game sometime somehow.

I report Everyone every time something I don't like happens.
Not like it's unjustified; that guy is a bastard.

*(Waits for down votes from the ignorant masses.)*
Yeah, you should report everything that goes wrong. Someone died? REPORT! Someone stole your kill? REPORT! It's exactly how you should use the system.

Let them keep reporting.

The more illegitimate reports they send in, the less seriously Riot takes their claims.

tbh I don't think it's a big deal because, assuming the system's working right, these kinds of reports would be taken less seriously (because the credibility would be questionable based on the past behavior of reporting, assuming this is a repeated thing)

> [{quoted}](name=naagza,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:18:49.306+0000)
>
> tbh I don't think it's a big deal because, assuming the system's working right, these kinds of reports would be taken less seriously (because the credibility would be questionable based on the past behavior of reporting, assuming this is a repeated thing)

That is the problem. The system isn't working. If you get X amount of reports you get automatically suspended. That is how the system works now.
I'm pretty sure it's somewhere in the "I deserve challenjour" clause.
fck u OP i downvoted you and yes if i lose i report the enemies best player bc fck them too taste my salt fgt

But.. But.. How will Rito know to ban these newbs?? :((((

On a more serious note. Yesterday a teammate was asking everyone to report me for intentional feeding because i was 0/3. -.-
I ended the game with a positive KDA, most CS, most gold, 2nd highest dmg done to champs.... yeah

Riot supports trolls.

And trolls are cry babies who report for the dumbest and smallest of reasons. Riot has created a community filled with pus/sies.

Truth.
losing a game entices people to report for more minor things

> [{quoted}](name=Farnermus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2015-07-30T01:42:28.803+0000)
>
> losing a game entices people to report for more minor things

That is true. Had an Ekko a while back have a really good game, but our team threw. He spent 3 minutes on the post game screen convincing the enemies to report us. Something like, "Report Shen for offensive language he said the F word 5 minutes in". "report LeBlanc for feeding going 5/9" (actually she was 5/9/21). I reported the dude and then had a message pop up on my screen that said something along the lines of, "We have punished a player who you recently reported. Thanks." Rekt.

Took this from old posts, $$ for posters XD
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/hphotos-xaf1/t51.2885-15/s320x320/e15/11376216_699113900217823_1550360556_n.jpg
Lyte: he's watching you .-.

blame riot for making EVERYTHING legit reportable. You cant win for losing because if you dont do exactly as one clueless delusional jackass on your team says well REPORT XXX for not cooperating, I told them to goto baron when our jungler is dead and they didnt come REPORT REPORT REPORT.

Riots fault for creating this pedantic whiney cry baby report mentality that has truly ruined this game.

i got a guy who decided to spam ff and intentionally feed because he was playing soraka and sucked. No joke, he won lane but didnt do a hell of alot of the next 5 min so he decides to do the before mentioned. We still won (easily) and he says hes gonna report all of us because we didnt ff and easy win  away.
100% of the community. *
95% is closer if you're going to be OCD, never play = never get banned = can't be 100% banrate

People don't care what you have to say about "chill guys". Another problem is the fact that the report system exists... That alone motivates people to report NOT for the reason that its intended for but because they are frustrated that they lost.

Report system is flawed in so many ways that i'm still shocked Riot considers it out of beta phase and that it's being used right now as we speak and counted as reliable and accurate.

What Riot should do is disable it completely and if someone has something seriously offensive and i mean something that they really are offended by then let them send in a ticket. If it does offend the person for sure then trust me they'll go through the trouble of sending in a ticket.

Right now reports are going left and right cause people can't handle a lost or a death or being outfarmed or w/e the minor issue might be. People do and say things when they are mad that they dont mean. The only comeback losers have is the report system. Thats it. And guess what? That is how it's being utilized. Report, report, report is all i hear in every single one of my games. Not one game in a very long time have i gone through an entire game without someone saying "report x cause hes feeding", "I'm reporting you because of X".

It's exhausting now. And it's creating a bunch of entitled cry babies. I'm afraid these kids will have a very difficult time adapting to the real world where there isn't a report button.

Riot, delete report system for the love of god.

> [{quoted}](name=WhaiSoSerious,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:35:14.538+0000)

> Right now reports are going left and right cause people can't handle a lost or a death or being outfarmed or w/e the minor issue might be. People do and say things when they are mad that they dont mean. The only comeback losers have is the report system. Thats it. And guess what? That is how it's being utilized. Report, report, report is all i hear in every single one of my games. Not one game in a very long time have i gone through an entire game without someone saying "report x cause hes feeding", "I'm reporting you because of X".
> 

I don't believe this. I personally have NEVER seen any of this.

> I don't believe this. I personally have NEVER seen any of this.

Yeah, okay. Cool story.

> [{quoted}](name=WhaiSoSerious,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b00000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:40:02.907+0000)
>
> Yeah, okay. Cool story.

Not as cool as yours.. but I guess post the chat log.. and then we can all know.

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:41:51.700+0000)
>
> Not as cool as yours.. but I guess post the chat log.. and then we can all know.

I wonder why everyone is posting the complete opposite of what you have convinced yourself of. Must just be a coincidence that a bunch of people are dealing with the same 3 people. Guess riot put a group of us with the same 3 guys who are toxic and emotionally unstable. Damn you Riot!

> [{quoted}](name=WhaiSoSerious,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:44:25.658+0000)
>
> I wonder why everyone is posting the complete opposite of what you have convinced yourself of. Must just be a coincidence that a bunch of people are dealing with the same 3 people. Guess riot put a group of us with the same 3 guys who are toxic and emotionally unstable. Damn you Riot!

I somehow convinced myself that I didn't get the pop up that says I was reported? But I did get the popup ANYWAY? That is your position.. seems pretty silly.

These boards are always filled with the toxic who come in to complain that it's all Rito's fault. They did nothing wrong.

I do miss the days of the Tirbunal when some intrepid Tribunaler would go dig up that person's reform card and we would all get a nice chuckles.

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:47:01.625+0000)
>
> I somehow convinced myself that I didn't get the pop up that says I was reported? But I did get the popup ANYWAY? That is your position.. seems pretty silly.
> 
> These boards are always filled with the toxic who come in to complain that it's all Rito's fault. They did nothing wrong.
> 
> I do miss the days of the Tirbunal when some intrepid Tribunaler would go dig up that person's reform card and we would all get a nice chuckles.

I never claimed everyone was innacent. What I'm saying is that it does happen and maybe you are the 1 in a million that doesn't deal with people (still think you are full of it). But from my experience of 5 years. Ive had to deal with some seriously obnoxious human beings coming from both sides. Even when it has literally nothing to do with me. People crying about how their ally is feeding or how they are verbally abusing them or w/e the case may be. It's childish trying to collect reports. It's actually pathetic.

I call bs if you say you've never been reported though.

Also I'd like to add that before tribunal changed I never got a warning or anything about me being toxic. Not till this new system came around that ive been getting reported for "feeding".

> [{quoted}](name=WhaiSoSerious,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lsvtpygQ,comment-id=002b000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T17:51:21.408+0000)
>
> I never claimed everyone was innacent. What I'm saying is that it does happen and maybe you are the 1 in a million that doesn't deal with people (still think you are full of it). But from my experience of 5 years. Ive had to deal with some seriously obnoxious human beings coming from both sides. Even when it has literally nothing to do with me. People crying about how their ally is feeding or how they are verbally abusing them or w/e the case may be. It's childish trying to collect reports. It's actually pathetic.
> 
> I call bs if you say you've never been reported though.

I have no idea if I have ever been reported.. I said I have never gotten that pop up that says something about having a bad day and modify your behavior.

And yea.. I guess I must be the 1 in a million.. Every other player gets reported every other game.

Now, maybe I'm missing something, but in the long run wouldn't it be *better* for them to report everyone after each game they lose? That sort of false report karma will get them devalued in the system a whole lot faster than them periodically falsely reporting people.
Reported because reported.
Saying "Are you guys going easy on us?" can get you reported for negative attitude/verbal abuse. Same with ggez, and lol at the end of the game.
Don't forget asking the enemy team to report someone mid-game.

Listen my friend, if you report someone for "Kill Stealing" it is dumb but in the end it helps your team and if the guy is feeding help him out. BUT to report in general it is the BRONZE WAY. LEE SIN TO YOUR HEART AND GO WHERE THE FLAME TAKES YOU EVEN IF IT MEANS DEATH. LISTEN ;~; IF A TEAM MATE IS FEEDING HELP HIM OUT MAN.{{champion:64}}
The Nami support accidentally took Katarina's kill... she freaked out and afked for ten minutes.

"No, I only report the one with most death.  
Because I don't allow unskilled player and I am stupid :^)"

That's how I got reported 8D
